EmailTemplate.subject: Rediscover our iconic design: Attaché Silver
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
We are excited to announce the relaunch of one of RIMOWA’s most iconic designs: the aluminum Attaché Silver.
A staple of the company since 1960s, the legendary RIMOWA Attaché has been revisited for a new generation of business travellers and more. Crafted in Köln, the RIMOWA Attaché pairs a vintage sensibility with minimalist design and offers a luxurious interior adapted to today’s needs!
I'd be happy to share more about the launch with you if you are interested in.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
